main event: A person observed an unidentified white, cigar-shaped object in the sky on July 5, 1967 in West Lafayette, Indiana.
interesting points: The object appeared to be brighter than a blinking beacon and had flashing lights at the rear center.
The object was observed for about 45 minutes and disappeared and reappeared during the sighting.
The witness was inside a building when they first saw the object.
The witness was unable to estimate the distance to the object.
There were no photographs taken of the object.
